title: Blackstone River Valley National Historical Park: Trip Itineraries
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Trip Itineraries             Trip Itineraries       Whether you are interested in learning more about the Valley’s history, want to take a quiet walk along the Blackstone Canal, or love paddling your way downstream, there are many ways to enjoy your visit to the Blackstone River Valley National Historical Park. Click the links below to see how to spend a full day or half day here in the Blackstone River Valley.              One Hour & Half Day Itinerary   Have a few hours to explore the Blackstone on your own? Here is an itinerary that will help guide you to the key sites around the park.        Full Day Intinerary   Have a full day to explore the Blackstone on your own? Here is an itinerary that will help guide you to the key sites around the park.
